_header: Saint Mary Gods mother from the apostles nas not
_description: The Assumption of Our Lady in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynte marie godes moder fram þe apostles nas noȝtþo
                    þe holi gost awitsoneday among hem was ibroȝt…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…So þat heo was of sixti ȝer ar heo were henne
                    InomeNou god ous grante uorþ wiþ hire to þe Ioie of heuene
                    come

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint marye goddes modir fram þe apostlis nas
                    nouȝtþo þe holy gost a whitsonday among hem was I
                    brouȝt…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Iesus for þin modir loue vs leue þedir to
                    wende& bringe vs to þe ioye of heuene þat is wit outen
                    ende

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Marie godus Moder fro þe Apostles was heo nouhtÞo
                    þe holigost on Witsonenday among hem was i brouht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…So þat heo was of sixti ȝer er heo weore heonne i
                    nomeNou God vs graunte forþ wiþ hire to þe ioye of heuene
                    come. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodEngPoetd200.First Lines:
SEinte marie godis modir fram þe apostlis nas noȝtþo
                    þe holi gost awit sonedai amonge hem was ybroȝt…
BodEngPoetd200.Last Lines:
…þere uore sike men al dai wel þilke a boute hym
                    soȝte& criden on hym deolfolliche þat hem to hele
                    broȝte

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Marie goddes moder fro þapostles nas nouhtþo
                    þe holy gost on witsonday among hem was brouht…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…So þat she was sixty ȝer er she were hennes y
                    nomeNou god vs graunte forþ with hire to þe ioye of heuene
                    come
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Mary Cristeȝ modre dere with þe Apostelȝ was shoOn
                    Witsononday when þe haly gaste fro heuen com þaim toffro þe
                    apostelȝ dorste sho noȝt go of þe Jeweȝ sho had slik
                    dredeBot til þat tyme duellid þaim amange als we in stody
                    rede…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…Nou goddeȝ modre þou quene of heuen als we hafe traiste
                    in þeGraunte vs blis þat þou art in Amen so mot it
                    be

CamCCC145.First Lines:
SEinte marie godes moder fram þe apostles nas noȝtþo
                    þe holygost a witesoneday among hom was ibroȝt…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…So þat he was of sixti ȝer þo he was henne
                    InomeNou god us granti forþ wiþ hure to þe ioie of heuene
                    come
CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.136-48.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
SEINT Marie godes moder ffram þe Apostles nas
                    nouȝtÞo þe holy gost a wytsoneday among ham was
                    ybrouȝt…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þo þat ȝeo was of sixty ȝer ar ȝeo wore
                    hennes ynomeNow god vs graunte fforþ wiþ hure to þe ioye of
                    heuene come

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint mare godys modir fram þe appostlis nas noȝtþo
                    þe holygost on wyt sonday to hem was y broȝt…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…so þat heo was of syxty ȝere ar heo were henne
                    nomeNow god ous graunt myd hire to þe Ioie of heuene come

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEinte Marie godes Moder fram þe apostles nas noȝtþo
                    þe holy gost awytesoneday among hom was y broȝt…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…So þat ȝo was of sixty ȝer þo ȝo was
                    henne y nomeNou god vs granty forþ wiþ hire to þe Ioye of
                    heuene come
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De assumcione sancte Marie Matris domini nostri ihesu cristi (f.
                    155, by scribe in margin beside first line); Assumpcio Marie
                    (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Marie godes moþer fro þe apostol nas noȝtþo þe holi gost a whitsondai among hom was ibroȝt…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þo þat heo was of sixti ȝer ar heo were henne y nomenou god ous graunte ford wit hire to þe ioie of heuen come
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lvii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 126).
BLCottJulDIX.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.
         https://www.bl.uk/manuscripts/FullDisplay.aspx?ref=Cotton_MS_Julius_D_IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: SEint Marie godes moder vrom þe apostles nas nouȝtÞo þe holi gost on witsonday to hem was wrouȝt…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …So þat heo was of sixti ȝer ar heo were henne nomeNow god vs graunte mid hire to þe ioie of heuene come

BLEge2891.First Lines: SEinte Marie godes moder fram þe apostles nas noȝtþo þe holigost a wite soneday among hom was ibroȝt…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …Mi leoue sone quaþ oure leuedy myn heorte al ȝare isAl ȝare he is and ichelle synge In mi Ioie and in my blis…
BLEge2891.Note: Lines 1-128 only: ends incomplete due to missing folio or folios between 132 and 133.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint marie godes moder fram þapostles nas noȝtþo þe holi gost a witsone dai among hem was ibroȝt…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …So þat heo was sixti ȝer þo heo was hunne ynomeNou god ous granti forþ wiþ hire to þe ioye of heuene come
BLHar2277.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of British Library Harley MS 2277.

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Mary goddis modere from þe apostels was nouȝtWhan
                    þe holy goost at whitsonday among hem was brouȝt…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…So þat she was sixti ȝeer olde er she were hens
                    ynomeGod vs graunte for þe loue of hur to þe blisse of hevene
                    come. Amen.
